temperature1Low.title: Temperature 1 Low Alarm
temperature1Low.description: Indicates if temperature 1 is below the threshold

temperature1High.title: Temperature 1 High Alarm
temperature1High.description: Indicates if temperature 1 is above the threshold

temperature2High.title: Temperature 2 High Alarm
